name: XTREMEGOLF
description:
XTREMEGOLF

_____________________________________________________________________

What the golf meets physics

by - AAC

OVERVIEW

XtremeGolf is a physics-based golf parody where the objective is to avoid all the dangers set up in the golf arena and hole the ball. The player must move around the level using the golf ball and avoid all the traps with timing and precision. 

             

_____________________________________________________________________

GOAL

The goal is to hole the golf ball while avoiding all the traps.

_____________________________________________________________________

CONTROLS Keyboard and mouse
  • Change Direction  - "A" and "D"
  • Add power                 - "W"
  • Decrease Power     - "S"
  • Shoot                             - "SPACE BAR"
  • Reset/ Stop                - "R"
_____________________________________________ TEAM MEMBERS

Abhay Venugopal - PM, Game Design

Arun Kurian - Programmer, Level Designer

Chrispaul Alias - Artist
